{"id":514667263,"lang":"java","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1624932049,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/514667263/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"39.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        if(s.length()==1) return 1;\n        int l=0,r=0;\n        int cnt=0,ma=0;\n        int[] check=new int[128];\n        Arrays.fill(check,0);\n        while(r<s.length()){\n            if(cnt==0){\n                ma=Math.max(ma,r-l);\n                if(check[s.charAt(r)]>=1){\n                    cnt=1;\n                }\n                check[s.charAt(r)]++;\n                r++;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(check[s.charAt(l)]==2){\n                    cnt=0;\n                }\n                check[s.charAt(l)]--;\n                l++;\n            }\n        }\n        if(cnt==0) ma=Math.max(ma,r-l);\n        return ma;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
